title: Tsuma, Shougakusei Ni Naru. Spinoff: Hatsukoi Aite No Kimi Wa Dare?

description:
Description :
        Now in high school, Takeru goes to his elementary school reunion and runs into Marika, his first love. This causes him to remember his elementary school days when he was in love with her, his classmate who'd recently become mature.
